Dialogues: Ruth#Befriending the sheep I see. Aren't they lovely?
Gnome in Ruth's head#They do not understand.
Gnome in Ruth's head#Not like you do. They can not be chosen.

Gnome in Ruth's head#Be vigilant. Keep your eyes open as you patrol the mountain.
We will not let anything bad happen here.
Ruth#Okay? I guess I can do that.
#*The gnome's nose looks satisfied, even though it is hard to tell.*
